newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech PX50 rises at fixing led by major issues.
newsitem.headline: Czech PX50 rises at fixing led by major issues.

text.p: 0900 GMT - The Czech PX50 rises again at Friday's fixing.
* On PX50, 19 shares rise, 23 fall, eight unchanged.
Czech shares continued to recover on Friday morning after heavy losses earlier in the week caused instability in the Czech currency, the crown.

The rebound was led by major issues. SPT Telecom jumped 87 crowns to 2,997, power utility CEZ rose 26 crowns to 921, Komercni Banka was up 51 crowns to 1,765 and savings bank Ceska Sporitelna rose eight crowns to 277.
On Friday morning, the crown was steady against its mark/dollar basket hovering around 4.0 percent below the basket mid-point.
